subject: URGENT: Your Amazon Account Will Be Suspended
body:
Dear Valued Customer,

We have detected suspicious activity on your Amazon account. Your account will be SUSPENDED within 24 hours unless you verify your information immediately.

Click here to verify your account: http://amaz0n-verify.tk/login

Failure to verify will result in permanent account closure. Act now to avoid losing access to your account and orders.

This is an automated message from Amazon Security Team.

Regards,
Amazon Customer Service

links.displayText: Click here to verify your account
